subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: At Las Vegas Motor Speedway, in a city of chance, Jimmie Johnson needed no luck to pass his teammate Jeff Gordon and win the Nascar Sprint Cup event.
snippet: At Las Vegas Motor Speedway, in a city of chance, Jimmie Johnson needed no luck to pass his teammate Jeff Gordon and win the Nascar Sprint Cup event.
